mapper.select: insert into wait (event_no, wait_tel, email) values(#{event_no}, #{wait_tel},#{email})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wait WHERE event_no = #{event_no} and wait_date >= curdate()
select * from wait where wait_tel = #{wait_tel} and state ='wait'
SELECT * FROM wait ORDER BY wait_no
select w.wait_no, w.wait_tel, w.email, w.wait_date, w.state, e.event_no, e.addr, e.name, e.img_path from wait w join event e ON w.event_no = e.event_no where w.wait_no = #{wait_no}
select * from wait where event_no = #{event_no} AND state = 'wait' order by wait_no
select * from wait where event_no = #{event_no} order by wait_no
select * from (select *, row_number() over (order by wait_no) num from wait where event_no = #{event_no} and state in ("wait", "able")) w where num in (1, 4) order by num
